definition: A person who studies celestial objects, their properties, and the universe as a whole, typically focusing on the scientific aspects of astronomy. This term is commonly used to refer to a female professional in the field.

examples.german: Die Astronomin hat einen Doktortitel in Astrophysik.
examples.english: The astronomer has a PhD in astrophysics.

examples.german: Die Astronomin entdeckte einen neuen Planeten.
examples.english: The astronomer discovered a new planet.

examples.german: Die Astronomin arbeitet an der Erforschung des Universums.
examples.english: The astronomer is working on the exploration of the universe.

examples.german: Die Astronomin verwendet Teleskope zur Beobachtung der Himmelsk√∂rper.
examples.english: The astronomer uses telescopes to observe celestial bodies.
